q:6946.question: It has been came to know that phone heated while charging and net use. Is it true? and how is the camera quality?
answer:
I am using redmi 3s prime since last one & half month. I am a heavy user with call on time of around 3-4 Hrs per day, continues syncing e-mails, browsing web, whatsapp. But i never feel the phone got heated up......So don't worry about that. Not heated up even while charging.

Camera performance is GOOD in Day Light, .. in artificial light as well Camera is WELL but images seems little shaking. Need some software update to capture this issue. But have many inbuilt Image modes which overall complete the Bouquet

Believe me i am Surprise with the phone performance. with above mix of use, battery consumption is around 60-30% of full charge with around 30-35% juice left for next day. 

Ove
